thread.title: Bartlomiej Jan Ting Tong
thread.title_full: iPhoneIMEI.Net reviewed by Bartlomiej Jan Ting Tong

author: Bartlomiej Jan Ting Tong
title: Bartlomiej Jan Ting Tong
text:
I requested unlock for my brand new 7 from EE and they priced me £32.99 for the service. After about 1 hour I received reply from them saying they can do that after 6 months of my contract or I need to pay another £80. I requested 24 hours refund as stated but haven't heard from them since. I paid £33 for an information I already knew. Don't spend my money in the stupid things.
Stay away from this thieves.
